com.jc.wm.ldap.activedirectory.listener

Class DirSyncEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.jc.ldap.activedirectory.listener.EventListener
        • com.jc.ldap.activedirectory.listener.DirSyncEventListener
          • com.jc.wm.ldap.activedirectory.listener.DirSyncEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DirSyncEventListener
extends com.jc.ldap.activedirectory.listener.DirSyncEventListener
    Concrete implementation of DirSyncEventListener to integrate listener in the webMethods integration server container i.e. leverage server and errors logs. Ensure that change events can be processed via a webMethods service rather than a java class.
    Author:
    John Carter

      Establish a new DirSynControlEvent listener to listen for object changes in an Active Directory server Don't forget to call EventListener.startup(long) afterwards to start the background thread to monitor for events Used EventListener.pleaseStop() to gracefully stop it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirSyncEventListener

        public DirSyncEventListener(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> env,
                            java.lang.String searchBase,
                            java.lang.String searchFilter,
                            java.lang.String[] returnAttributes,
                            java.lang.String service,
                            java.lang.String userId,
                            java.lang.String debugLevel)
                     throws javax.naming.NamingException,
                            com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Establish a new DirSynControlEvent listener to listen for object changes in an Active Directory server Don't forget to call EventListener.startup(long) afterwards to start the background thread to monitor for events Used EventListener.pleaseStop() to gracefully stop it.
        Parameters:
        env - Hashtable of ldap attributes to setup connection
        searchBase - directory root to scan, must a valid domain partition
        searchFilter - filter for active directory search (e.g. (&(objectClass=person)(objectClass=user))
        returnAttributes - Optional list of attributes to check for updates, otherwise all attributes will be checked
        service - webMethods service to be invoked when processing change events
        userId - optional webMethods user id to be used when invoking service
        debugLevel - Either "Info", "Error", "Warn" or "Debug", specified whether to log or not to server log
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
